resources.string:
ROM'u SD karttan yükle/string> ROM indir ROM güncellemelerine bak Yedekleme ve Geri yükleme Yedekleri kontrol et ve sil Yüklü ROM'u yedekle
Kaynaktan indirilirken hata oluştu. Lütfen internet bağlantınızın olduğundan emin olun veya SD kartın takılı olduğundan ya da yeterli boş alan olduğundan emin olun!
ROM Manager is not responsible for any damage that you may cause to your phone. By rooting your phone, you have already voided your warranty. Playing around in non-userspace is dangerous. In addition, ROM Manager may send anonymous usage statistics to Google Analytics to help improve the application. Press OK to agree. Press Cancel to exit the application.
Your ROM is not set up to receive OTA Updates. Please contact the ROM developer! The ROM you are using does not support OTA Updates. The developer of this ROM needs to make the appropriate changes so their ROM support OTA update. Please contact the ROM developer! Please DO NOT contact ROM Manager: THIS IS NOT A ROM MANAGER BUG. Advanced Mode Advanced Mode is not meant for all users. Advanced mode will get you access to the latest recoveries, experimental ROMs, and other various unstable, but bleeding edge features. Advanced mode should be used with caution and is only recommended for users comfortable with ADB. Advanced Mode is enabled. Advanced Mode is disabled. This is available once you enable Advanced Mode from the ROM Manager Main menu.

Changelog
New Features
Install from QR Code
QR Code Download Take a picture to install a ROM. Requires the free Barcode Scanner application. You need the Premium version of ROM Manager to install ROMs from QR Codes! Missing Barcode Scanner You must have Barcode Scanner installed to use this feature! Press OK to install free Barcode scanner application from the Market.
Flash Recovery? Are you sure you wish to replace your recovery?
Google Analytics Google Analytics will send anonymous usage statistics to help make ROM Manager a better app! By pressing OK, you state that you understand that anonymous usage information will be sent to Google and the developers of ROM Manager. Google Analytics is on. Thanks for helping make ROM Manager a better app! Google Analytics is off. You should turn this on!
Quick Backup and Restore Progress bars in Backup and Restore are disabled for speed. Progress bars in Backup and Restore are enabled. Disable for quicker backup and restores.

Corrupt zip file.
ROM Manager is unable to open this file. Please remove any spaces from your file and folder path. Or run it manually via ClockworkMod recovery. This does not seem to be a valid backup. The MD5 file is missing.
Show Advertisements Help support ROM Manager! (Changes require application restart.)
Recovery Failure
Recovery mode is \"broken\".
ROM Manager doesn\'t reboot.
Other.
There are several ways to fix a \"broken\""" recovery:\n1) Flash an alternate or older recovery and then flash back to the current version.\n2) Try enabling "Erase Recovery" in ROM Manager\'s Settings.\n3) Try clearing the download cache via the menu and reflashing.\n4) Flash back to an older recovery.\n5) Fastboot or SBF a recovery onto your phone from your PC. Some ROMs have a broken "reboot" binary. View this thread on your computer for more information: http://bit.ly/dj9qbN. Please feel free to email me at koush@clockworkmod.com with your bug!

Backup Directory In Android 4.2, backups are placed in secure directory, inaccessible to other apps.\nBackups can be pulled with adb or by using the ROM Manager Backup Download Server.
